name: Algonquin Power & Utilities Corp.
description: Algonquin Power & Utilities Corp. is a diversified renewable energy and utility company based in Canada, committed to sustainable energy and water solutions. Founded in 1988, Algonquin operates in North America and serves over 1 million customers through its regulated utilities, including electric, natural gas, and water distribution services. The company has a significant presence in the renewable energy sector, generating power from wind, solar, and hydroelectric sources, with a strong emphasis on reducing carbon emissions and promoting environmental stewardship. Algonquin's renewable energy portfolio exceeds 1,800 megawatts, positioning it as a leader in the transition to clean energy. The company's mission is to provide reliable and sustainable energy solutions while enhancing the quality of life in the communities it serves. Algonquin is dedicated to responsible governance, community engagement, and environmental sustainability, ensuring that its operations contribute positively to the planet and society. As the demand for clean energy solutions grows, Algonquin continues to expand its operations, focusing on strategic acquisitions and partnerships to enhance its portfolio and drive future growth.
